name: Bon! Music
description:
what's bon! music

A beginner guide to music composition, with cute animals!

Form your own band, write your own music. If you are confused, watch tutorials!

the main catalog

what we have...

  • 8 gorgeous video tutorials about composition
  • 40+ unique interactions in the tutorials
  • 4 tracks: drum, melody, harmony, bass
  • 17+ cute characters to play your music
  • 23+ sounds in the playground

the composition courses

beginner-friendly experience

We have handy tips for all four components in music:

Rhythm, Melody, Chords and Bassline.

you can apply existing drum patterns

melody writing tips

a handy tool for chord writing

bassline in diffrent styles

jam with your ideas! 

and arrange them together

We provide two modes to write your music:

JAM as you can write small pieces, and ARRANGE when you feel like putting them together.

jam first

and arrange them to a song!

with animals play your music!

You can unlock animals while finishing your courses.

There're always new ones in the store!

explore new characters

Bon! Music is currently under closed beta, which means you'll get an in-development build -- most of the features (including video tutorials and the songwriting tool) are available, while some minor features are still under development.

There may be some bugs. 🐞

If you find any, the best way to report it is to tell us on Discord!
